channel.title: I need Help! Blackscreen + Connection losing
channel.description:
Okay, I don't know why my server is doing this suddenly. But nobody can log on. When we try to logon we get on, but theres a black screen and we can't type or anything and it disconnects us.
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/36/89786255xt7.png[/img]
It says this at the end:
[img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/412/60250782rd9.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2008, 01:59:59 PM[/size][hr] 1
